negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.tools

Class UtilitySpaceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.utility.AbstractUtilitySpace
      • negotiator.utility.AdditiveUtilitySpace
        • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.tools.UtilitySpaceAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, UtilitySpace

    public class UtilitySpaceAdapter
extends AdditiveUtilitySpace
    Some opponent models do not use the UtilitySpace-object. Using this object, a UtilitySpace-object can be created for each opponent model.
    Author:
    Mark Hendrikx
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getUtility

        public double getUtility(Bid b)
        Specified by:
        getUtility in interface UtilitySpace
        Overrides:
        getUtility in class AdditiveUtilitySpace
        Parameters:
        b - of which we are interested in its utility.
        Returns:
        Utility of the given bid. This utility is undiscounted: there is no time dependent devaluation of the utility. See also UtilitySpace.discount(double, double).

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight(int i)
        Overrides:
        getWeight in class AdditiveUtilitySpace
        Parameters:
        i - The Issue or Objective to get the weight from
        Returns:
        The weight, or -1 if the objective doesn't exist. Only works with linear utility spaces.
